org.shortbrain.vaadin.container

Interface ContainerFactory<BEAN>

  • Type Parameters:
    BEAN - type of the beans.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractContainerFactory

    public interface ContainerFactory<BEAN>
    ContainerFactory interface that define methods to facilitate the creation of Containers from a list of objects using different algorithms.
    Author:
    Vincent Demeester

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromList(com.vaadin.data.Container container, List<BEAN> beans)
      Return a container of type BEAN from a list of BEAN objects.
      com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromList(com.vaadin.data.Container container, List<BEAN> beans, Class<? extends com.vaadin.data.Container> containerClass)
      Return a container of type BEAN from a list of BEAN objects.
      com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromList(List<BEAN> beans, Class<? extends com.vaadin.data.Container> containerClass)
      Return a container of type BEAN from a list of BEAN objects.

    • Method Detail

      • getContainerFromList

        com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromList(com.vaadin.data.Container container,
                                             List<BEAN> beans)
        Return a container of type BEAN from a list of BEAN objects. It will update the given container if no null.
        Parameters:
        container - container to be populated.
        beans - list of beans.
        Returns:
        a container of Beans.

      • getContainerFromList

        com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromList(com.vaadin.data.Container container,
                                             List<BEAN> beans,
                                             Class<? extends com.vaadin.data.Container> containerClass)
        Return a container of type BEAN from a list of BEAN objects. It will update the given container if no null. The returned container will be of the given type (containerClass).
        Parameters:
        container - container to be populated.
        beans - list of beans.
        containerClass - type of the container to return.
        Returns:
        a container of Beans.

      • getContainerFromList

        com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromList(List<BEAN> beans,
                                             Class<? extends com.vaadin.data.Container> containerClass)
        Return a container of type BEAN from a list of BEAN objects. The returned container will be of the given type (containerClass).
        Parameters:
        beans - list of beans.
        containerClass - type of the container to return.
        Returns:
        a container of Beans.
